name: Devin's Project
description: Press 1 for the main menu when you are in the open world - F is activate, if that doesnt work use E. Press space to drift. Press i to open the furniture ui and left click any one you want, then right click to place the furniture. There is a box on the right that is blank that if you toggle it will allow you to destroy the furniture you placed and will be added back to your inventory. This game is VERY early access and bare bones right now but it is up now so if you have any questions DM me on instagram @dacrentals
